log-expression.expression:
mport json ##准备数据 lst=[ {'name':'gentel','age':20,'score':90}, {'name':'tom','age':21,'score':99}, {'name':'jeke','age':19,'score':89} ] print(lst) ##编码 s=json.dumps(lst,ensure_ascii=False,indent=4)##ensure_ascii=False正常显示为中文、indent=4增加数据的缩进使json格式的字符串更有可读性 print(type(s))##编码的过程，将字典转成了字符串类型 print(s) ##解码 lst2=json.loads(s) print(type(lst2)) print(lst2)
##编码到文件中 with open('txt/高维数据的存储.txt','w') as file: json.dump(lst,file,ensure_ascii=False,indent=4)
##解码到程序 with open('txt/高维数据的存储.txt','r') as file: lst3=json.load(file) print(type(lst3)) print(lst3)
